page.title: 19The Hordon Cricket Team
page.content: The Cricket Team plays at the recreation ground. This year the Council are building a new pavilion. They run 2 teams and a colts XI. They were promoted to Div. 2 of the Lillywhite Frowd League this season. Orsett have beaten them in the final of the Thurrock Knockout Comp. the last 2 years. Captained by D. Stitson Snr., they have been successful in the National Village Knockout Comp. They beat W. Tilbury in the area final to reach the last 32 scoring 86 for 1 in reply to 82. S. Wright took 5 for 11. They travelled to play Glynde and Beddingham in Sussex. Horndon scored 194-7 C.M. Gillet 194 N.O.J. In reply Glynde scored 104. Horndon scored 725 in the next match and Langleybury, Herts scored 4 off the last ball to win an exciting game.
